attributes.additional_details: Thomas Field attacked Reece Roberts, and was handed down an appallingly short sentence. We would like to see Thomas Field handed the maximum sentence for his crime.

rejection.details:
Sentences that appear to be unduly lenient cannot be referred through the E-Petitions website. If you believe a sentence given in a Crown Court appears to be very low, or unduly lenient, anyone can contact the Attorney General's office asking for the sentence to be reviewed as long as it is within 28 days of sentencing

Only certain offences can be referred to the Court of Appeal as being unduly lenient. The offences for which Thomas Field was sentenced are not among those that can be referred.
